description:
When drawn, costs 2 less this round.
Deal 3 to a unit.
descriptionRaw:
When drawn, costs 2 less this round.
Deal 3 to a unit.
flavorText:
"Mind trying on these handcuffs, Mr. Berz?"
"What's in it for me?"
"You can keep them."
"...A'right then."
"You're under arrest. Take him away!"
name: Gotcha!
